channel.title: Friday Night Comedy from BBC Radio 4
channel.description: Bringing you a satirical take on the week's news with The News Quiz and The Now Show from BBC Radio 4. Enjoy a satirical take on the week’s news with the cream of UK comedy talent.

item.title: FriComedy: 01 Jun 12: The News Quiz
item.description: Doctors, Drinking, and a Diamond Jubilee. Sandi Toksvig hosts with guests Andy Hamilton, Rebecca Front, Jeremy Hardy and Susan Calman in the week that medicine stopped for a day, alcohol stopped looking so healthy, and a royal celebration went up against a slightly less monarchical event.
item.itunes:subtitle: Doctors, Drinking, and a Diamond Jubilee. Sandi Toksvig hosts with guests Andy Hamilton, Rebecca Front, Jeremy Hardy and Susan Calman in the week that medicine stopped for a day, alcohol stopped looking so healthy, and a royal celebration went up...
